name: Super Capsule Room
description:
Super Capsule Room
A game for the disc room game jam.

Mixing Super Crate Box and Disc Room.

Move with arrow keys/wasd/gamepad, use items with spacebar/gamepad btn 1.
Escape close the game and ALT + ENTER for fullscreen/window mode.

Code and Art by @1_peck_1.
Audio courtesy of doseone.

If you encounter any trouble running the game, try the vm version.
